VoiceList.Entry: “So that overgrown moon's gonna fall on us,huh?”
“This's no joke! We've got to start stocking up on supplies before they're all gone!”
“Outta the way! Hey,move it,move it!”
“You again! You aren't hoarding up goods too,are you?”
“Don't reach in front of me! Everything in this store is mine!”
“I've got money to burn! I've been saving like mad just for a time like this!”
“C'mon,outta the way! Move,will you,move!”
“Oh…not much time left!! You never know when that moon's gonna come crashing down!!”
“When it all comes down to it, this world's about money and material things!”
“If you got 'em,you can get by whenever,wherever!”
“Gotta buy!! Gotta buy,buy,buy!! I'm gonna shop till I drop!!”
“Welcome to the charity store, a store of love and courage! What can I get you today?”
“Thank you very much! Please come again.”
“Welcome to the charity store, a store of love and courage!”
“Unfortunately,regarding the place you'd like to go…”
“The other customers have booked it all up… I'm afraid nothing's left.”
“…just kidding! Ha,hah,hah! Now how can I help you?”
Tifa “No good… I wonder if it's locked?”
Cid “No good… Someone must've locked it.”
Tifa “Hmm…you really locked this one up good.”
Cid “Damn,why the hell did they make something tricky like this?”
Tifa “…The key broke off inside, and I can't get to it…”
“… I don't know anything about it.”
Cid “…The key broke off inside, and I can't get to it…”
“… I don't know a thing about it…”
Tifa “Oh yeah,shall I try that old beat up key?”
Cid “Hey,I know what'll do it… Let's try that beat up old key!”
Tifa “I'd better not. It doesn't look like it fits.”
Cid “Naw,forget it… It doesn't even look like it fits.”
Tifa “Okay,this is it.”
Cid “Yeah,this is it.”
Tifa “Hmm…Huh? This is pretty tight…”
Cid “Huh? Wha? Won't turn…”
Tifa “Eyaaah!?”
Cid “Wha?”
Tifa “Oh no! …it broke. Now I can't get it out…”
Cid “Hoo,*&%$^% Busted it… Can't get the damn thing out…”
“Is something wrong?”
Tifa “Ulp!?”
Cid “Ulp!!”
Tifa “Huh? Uh,no…”
Tifa “What am I gonna do?”
Cid “Oh,uh,no,uh I…”
Cid “Damn,this's bad…”
Tifa “Nothing! I was just thinking how nice that door was,that's all.”
Cid “Er,nothin'. Hah,hah. That's one nice door you got there,y'know.”
“Oh…why,thank you very much.”
Tifa “Whew…that was close. But I feel bad…”
Cid “Phew…that was a close one. But I kinda feel a little bad about it.”
Tifa “I'm…sorry! I forced the key and it broke!”
Cid “Mmm…sorry! I twisted the ^%$#^ and it broke.”
“Huh? Key? You mean the one to that door?”
“Hah,hah,hah! That's a good one!”
Tifa “???”
“Of course there's no key. It's a wall. We just painted a door on it.”
Tifa “What!? It's not a real door?”
Cid “Say what? You drew that door on the wall?”
“That's right. We drew it on there to make it feel like you could pass through it to another world.”
“Sorry to have surprised you. It's not much of an apology,but please take this.”
Tifa “Really? Thank you.”
Cid “Oh,uh…well Thanks.”
“We're hoping to pass through a door like that one into another world.”
“I feel that you all might be able to make my dreams come true. Weird,isn't it?”
Tifa “What is it? You're being awful friendly all of a sudden.”
“Oh,so that's it. You want the Mimmet Greens…don't you?”
Tifa “Sorry,little guy. I can't give you any.”
Tifa “Well,okay. Here,go ahead and eat.”
Tifa “hee hee…how cute! I just want to tickle him.”
Cid “What's this!? You're bein' awful friendly.”
“Oh,so that's it. You want the Mimmet Greens…don't you?”
Cid “Sorry,shorty. But I can't give ya any.”
Cid “Well,guess there's no way around it. Here ya go,shrimp. Eat up.”
Cid “Heh heh,hey he's kinda cute. Aw,maybe I'll just tickle him a little.”
Tifa “Oh,you scared me…! I thought you were dead!”
Cid “Sheesh,you scared me. I thought you croaked!!”
